nodes.text: Tressk was a male Rodian who lived during the Galactic Civil War. He was hired to kill two poachers on Kashyyyk. On the planet, he saw the lost Rodian hunters at Rryatt Trail as an embarrassment, and so asked a spacer to eliminate them.

Tressk appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
